data.actual_result: Users cached from your main account that you talked to appear when you type their name even though you never spoke to them or share server in this new account
data.short_description: Registering a new account after signing out of your main account carries over users in the "Find or Start a Conversation"
data.steps_to_repro: - Sign into your main - Talk to some people in your DMs - Sign out - Register a new account - After registering go to the "Find or Start a Conversation" in the DM list - Type in a user that you talked to with on your main
